coveo:metadata.description: Analytic workloads and the ability to determine what happened are some of the most common use cases across enterprises today - helping you understand and adapt based on changing trends. However, for most businesses today, they are only able to see a piece of the story. Analytics are limited by the amount of data able to be stored and ultimately accessed, its time-intensive to bring in new datasets or fit unstructured data into rigid schemas, and user access is constrained to a select few who must already know the questions theyre trying to answer.
coveo:metadata.title: Building a Modern Analytic Database with Cloudera 5.8

coveo:metadata.description: The emerging Industrial Internet of Things gives rise to what is predicted to be a sweeping change that will fundamentally reconfigure the IT industry. Vast amounts of useful sensor data will yield new business opportunities and competitors in nearly every corporation via analytics. However, all too often, sensor data is trapped in point solutions. The information required to enable breakthrough insights is fragmented within the domains of Information Technology and Operational Technology (OT). Further, organizations are realizing that analytics on sensor data is diverse and complex. Join us for this webinar to learn how leading companies harness the Internet of Things: - Putting IoT data in context - Fostering collaboration between IT and OT - Enabling a new breed of scalable analytics
coveo:metadata.title: When Big Data Meets the Internet of Things

coveo:metadata.description: Cloudera Enterprise can be used as an adaptive, high-performance analytic database, complementing existing data warehouses by relieving the pressure of growing numbers of ETL jobs and BI analytics. But where do you get started when developing your offload strategy? Cloudera Navigator Optimizer eases the path for moving the right workloads to Hadoop and then actively manages data allowing you to take advantage of Hadoops benefits. Now generally available with the recent release of Cloudera 5.8 and a unique part of Clouderas analytic database solution, Navigator Optimizer gives you the workload visibility and assessments to build a predictable offload plan, adapt to evolving data and workload demands, and optimize query performance for Hadoop technologies.
coveo:metadata.title: Introducing Cloudera Navigator Optimizer: Offload Assessments and Active Data Optimization for Hadoop Success

coveo:metadata.description: Learn how Informatica, Cloudera, and Teradata work together to provide greater customer insights to Marketing organizations. Cloudera CTO, Amr Awadallah presents Cloudera's view on how Marketing can get value out of big data and Hadoop with a modern data strategy.
coveo:metadata.title: 3CTO Informatica Webinar with Cloudera and Teradata

coveo:metadata.description: With more and more data being generated and stored in the cloud, you need a modern data platform that can extend to any environment so you can derive value from all your data. Cloudera Enterprise is the leading enterprise Hadoop platform for cloud deployments. Its the easiest way to manage and secure Hadoop data across any cloud environment and includes component-level support for cloud-native object stores. This makes the platform uniquely suited to handle transient jobs like ETL and BI analytics, as well as persistent workloads like stream processing and advanced analytics.
coveo:metadata.title: High-Performance Analytics in the Cloud with Apache Impala

coveo:metadata.description: In this webinar, our guest, Forrester Vice President and Principal Analyst Brian Hopkins, presents results from two years of research into these ideas and recommend to attendees how they can get the most out of their data and analytics to drive effective business decisions and gain competitive advantage.
coveo:metadata.title: Moving from data to insights

coveo:metadata.description: Firms have become obsessed with data. But the key to competitive advantage is not just more or bigger data or big data technology, it is finding actionable insights from all the data as well as embedding insight in processes and applications. This requires a change in your approach - modernized architecture and embedding insights and data in your business decisions. It also requires a change in how your people work systematically to find, test and implement insights. In this webinar, our guest, Forrester Vice President and Principal Analyst Brian Hopkins, presents results from two years of research into these ideas and recommend to attendees how they can get the most out of their data and analytics to drive effective business decisions and gain competitive advantage.
coveo:metadata.title: APAC Webinar Wednesday - Moving from data to insights

coveo:metadata.description: Securonix co-founder and CTO Tanuj Gulati demonstrates how Securonix user and behavior entity analytics (UEBA) plus Clouderas next generation data and analytics management platform combine to deliver on the promise of big data security analytics. Securonix + Cloudera allows organizations to apply UEBA and machine learning to HR/identity information, active directory, and activity logs to detect compromised users accounts, insider threats, and other advanced persistent threats.
coveo:metadata.title: Delivering User Behavior Analytics at Apache Hadoop Scale

coveo:metadata.description: Capgeminis Leap Data Transformation Framework helps clients by industrializing every aspect of transforming existing BI assets and capabilities to next generation big data management platforms. In this session, you will learn: - The key drivers to industrialize your transformation to big data at all stages of the lifecycle estimation, design, implementation and testing - How one of our largest client reduced the transition effort to modern data architecture by over 30% - How an end-to-end, fact-based transformation framework can deliver IT rationalization on top of Big Data architectures
coveo:metadata.title: Is your big data journey stalling? Take the Leap with Capgemini and Cloudera

coveo:metadata.description: In this demo, we will show you how to set up an analytic database in the public cloud with Cloudera Director. We will take you step by step through the intuitive deployment process and demonstrate how Impala can now perform reads and writes to Amazon S3. Cloudera Director is the fastest way to deploy and manage Hadoop clusters across cloud environments.
coveo:metadata.title: Deploy and Run Apache Impala on AWS with Cloudera Director

coveo:metadata.description: As one of the largest and most successful auditing and consulting firms, PwC must constantly find the best ways to help clients manage risks and meet compliance obligations. Find out how they used Paxata and Cloudera to accelerate their analytics process along with lessons learned that can apply to your own organizations data-to-information pipeline.
coveo:metadata.title: How PwC Transformed Their Analytics with A Modern Data-to-Information Pipeline

coveo:metadata.description: Join Securonix co-founder and CTO Tanuj Gulati as he demonstrates how Securonix user and behavior entity analytics (UEBA) plus Clouderas next generation data and analytics management platform combine to deliver on the promise of big data security analytics. Securonix + Cloudera allows organizations to apply UEBA and machine learning to HR/identity information, active directory, and activity logs to detect compromised users accounts, insider threats, and other advanced persistent threats.
coveo:metadata.title: Delivering User Behavior Analytics at Apache Hadoop Scale, a New Perspective on Cybersecurity with Securonix & Cloudera

coveo:metadata.description: Companies are running Cloudera Enterprise on Microsoft Azure to achieve some of their most critical, data-driven business objectives. Once the primary architecture for running Hadoop pilots and dev/test applications, the cloud is fast becoming a preferred destination for enterprise big data workloads. Today enterprises are using Hadoop to deliver better products and services, improve their visibility and reduce risk, and theyre doing it at greater scale and efficiency in the cloud. Join experts from Cloudera, Microsoft, and Adecco to learn how: Organizations are finding success with Cloudera Enterprise on Azure To deploy and configure your Cloudera cluster on Azure To ensure your data is secure and governed in the cloud You can get started recognizing value from your Azure data
coveo:metadata.title: How to Run Cloudera Enterprise on Microsoft Azure

coveo:metadata.description: Organizations across diverse industries are in pursuit of Customer 360 - integrating all customer information across multiple channels, systems, devices and products. Having that 360-degree view of the customer enables enterprises to improve interaction experience, drive customer loyalty, and improve retention. However, delivering this can be very challenging. Industry experts share how organizations can utilize an Enterprise Data Hub, powered by Apache Hadoop, to effectively stitch together a true 360-degree view.
coveo:metadata.title: APAC Cloudera Webinar Wednesday: Using Big Data to Drive Customer 360

coveo:metadata.description: One of the benefits of the Apache Hadoop ecosystem is the ability to choose the broad set of ecosystem components to efficiently meet the requirements of your use case. The availability of multiple frameworks gives users the ability to do real-time or batch processing with varied storage engines, efficiently handling your data along the way. However, when a use case requires a lambda architecture - a combination of speed and batch layers - the Hadoop ecosystems response has been to stitch together a complex hybrid architecture from its existing components. Cloudera has identified this gap, and plans to address it through Apache Kudu, the storage engine for fast analytics on fast data.
coveo:metadata.title: Moving Beyond Lambda Architectures with Apache Kudu

coveo:metadata.description: As organizations look at new ways to protect themselves from advanced adversaries, big data analytics continues to become a critical piece of a modern cybersecurity strategy. From inserting machine learning into processes to leveraging user behavior analytics, organizations require big data analytics to detect advanced threats in minutes. Join Rocky DeStefano, Cloudera Cybersecurity Subject Matter Expert, and Larry Ponemon, Founder of the Ponemon Institute, as they discuss recent studies of the current state of cybersecurity big data analytics.
coveo:metadata.title: 2016 Cybersecurity Analytics State of the Union

coveo:metadata.description:
We are in the midst of a fundamental shift in the way in which organizations protect themselves from the modern adversary.
Join Rocky DeStefano, Cloudera's Cybersecurity subject matter expert, as he explores how modern organizations are protecting themselves from more frequent, sophisticated attacks.
coveo:metadata.title: APAC Cloudera Webinar Wednesday: Preparing for the Cybersecurity Renaissance

coveo:metadata.description:
Financial firms are under pressure to grow their business while containing risk and complying with many regulations world-wide. In addition, there is the growing demand from customers to improve their experience and offer new services over multiple channels.
We are going to hear about trends in the industry from IDC Financial Insights Research Director Bill Fearnley, followed by a discussion about how Cloudera has helped Transamerica turn their data into competitive advantage by creating an Enterprise Marketing and Analytics Engine.
coveo:metadata.title: APAC Cloudera Webinar Wednesday: Financial Services Webinar with IDC and Transamerica

coveo:metadata.description:
Data is the future of business. Either take advantage of it, or get surpassed by those who do.
In this webinar, Ovum's Tony Baer discusses the importance of building a modern data strategy that ensures your journey with Apache Hadoop and big data is a successful one. Together, we'll walk through how to build a plan for long-term success while realizing short-term gains.
coveo:metadata.title: APAC Cloudera Webinar Wednesday: Modernizing Architecture for a Complete Data Strategy

coveo:metadata.keywords: Videos,Enterprise Data Hub (EDH),Webinars,Big Data,Analytics,Customer Insights,Data Science,Operations
coveo:metadata.description: Big data is an initiative every business knows they should take on, but no one knows how to tackle the project. We'll discuss the industry trends around big data projects, the pitfalls with adopting a modern data strategy, and how to avoid them by building a culture of data-driven teams.
coveo:metadata.title: Becoming Data-Driven Through Cultural Change

coveo:metadata.description: Mike Olson, Co-founder and CSO of Cloudera and Oliver Ratzesberger, Executive VP and Chief Product Officer of Teradata share their view on the Unified Data Architecture and the need of running new workloads on existing and new data systems.
coveo:metadata.title: Teradata and Cloudera Executive Series - Shared Point of View on the Unified Data Architecture (UDA)

coveo:metadata.description: Mike Olson, Co-founder, CSO of Cloudera and Oliver Ratzesberger, Executive VP, Chief Product Officer of Teradata talked about enabling organizations to gain value from their data quickly, through Teradata Appliance for Hadoop with Cloudera
coveo:metadata.title: Teradata and Cloudera Executive Series - Faster Time to Value with the Teradata Appliance for Hadoop with Cloudera

coveo:metadata.description: "You have to put your data analytics where your data resides." Join Mike Olson, Co-founder and CSO of Cloudera and Oliver Ratzesberger, Executive VP and Chief Product Officer of Teradata on their views on the need of hybrid-cloud enabled data management platform.
coveo:metadata.title: Teradata and Cloudera Executive Series - Enabling the Hybrid Cloud

coveo:metadata.description: Analytics of things is not only changing the way organizations use data, but fundamentally change their business with data. Mike Olson, Co-founder and CSO of Cloudera and Oliver Ratzesberger, Executive VP and Chief Product Officer of Teradata talk about how we accelerate the analytics of things.
coveo:metadata.title: Teradata and Cloudera Executive Series - Accelerate the Analytics of Things

coveo:metadata.description: For many organizations, achieving regulatory compliance is challenging and time-consuming. To reduce the cost of compliance reporting, as well as optimize its efficiency, we need to go from point solutions to a more holistic approach that makes compliance part of the day-to-day business process.
coveo:metadata.title: Optimizing Regulatory Compliance with Big Data

coveo:metadata.description: Learn About: The IoT ecosystem & data management considerations for IoT, top IoT use cases & data architecture strategies for managing volume & variety of IoT data, and real-life case studies on how our customers are using Cloudera Enterprise to drive insights and analytics from all of their IoT data
coveo:metadata.title: Top 5 IoT Use Cases

coveo:metadata.description: Using Apache Hadoop to Derive Value from IoT and Connected Cars. 3 Things to Learn About: *Customer success stories from Navistar and other leading auto manufacturers and insurers *Key use cases and data architecture strategies for managing data from connected vehicles *Cloudera Connected Car Demo
coveo:metadata.title: Enabling the Connected Car Revolution

coveo:metadata.description:
Things to Learn About:
  • How Sparklyr supports a complete backend for dplyr, a popular tool for working with data frame objects both in memory and out of memory,
  • How Sparklyr llows data scientists to use dplyr to translate R code into Spark SQL, and
  • How Sparklyr supports MLlib so data scientists can run classifiers, regressions, and many other machine learning algorithms in Spark.
coveo:metadata.title: Analyzing Hadoop Data Using Sparklyr

coveo:metadata.description: In this webinar, we will host a discussion panel with Cloudera cofounder & CTO Amr Awadallah. Learn best practices and gain a deep understanding of the real-world benefits from using big data analytics on your customer data.
coveo:metadata.title: Part 1: Transform Customer Experience with Big Data

coveo:metadata.description: In the past, when a use case required real-time analytics, architects had to develop a lambda architecture -a combination of speed and batch layers. This complex architecture was difficult to manage. Today, Apache Kudu offers the ability to collapse these two layers into a simplified storage engine.
coveo:metadata.title: Part 1: Lambda Architectures: Simplified by Apache Kudu Webinar

coveo:metadata.keywords: Demos,Videos,Webinars,Hive,Video,Cloud,Cloudera Manager,CDH,Information Technology,Impala,Cloudera Search,Enterprise Data Hub (EDH),About Cloudera,Kudu,Big Data,HDFS,Data Science
coveo:metadata.description: In this video we discuss how Clouderas analytic database solution powers business-critical workloads in multi-cloud and hybrid environments, enabling companies to ultimately get more value from more data.
coveo:metadata.title: Clouderas Analytic Database: BI & SQL Analytics in a Hybrid Cloud World

coveo:metadata.description: Learn about how Clouderas Operational Database enables you to run a scalable, enterprise-grade platform in any cloud environment, with the ability to move between public clouds and your own datacenter.
coveo:metadata.title: Part 2: Clouderas Operational Database: Unlocking New Benefits in the Cloud Webinar

coveo:metadata.description: PRGX is the world's leading provider of accounts payable audit services and works with leading global retailers. As new forms of data started to flow into their organizations, standard RDBMS systems were not allowing them to scale. Now, by using Talend with Cloudera Enterprise, they are able to acheive a 9-10x performance benefit in processing data, reduce errors, and now provide more innovative products and services to end customers. Watch this webinar to learn how PRGX worked with Cloudera and Talend to create a high-performance computing platform for data analytics and discovery that rapidly allows them to process, model, and serve massive amount of structured and unstructured data.
coveo:metadata.title: Turning Petabytes of Data into Profit with Hadoop for the Worlds Biggest Retailers

coveo:metadata.description: Hear success stories where organizations prevent customer churn, increase customer loyalty, and create upsell opportunities. coveo:metadata.description:
While Public Sector technology demands often mirror many of those in the private sector, the outcome for government leaders remains focused on enhancing citizen services and providing security for constituents. Listen to this recorded webinar with Cloudera and Gartner to learn how a data driven government can cost effectively support the mission of your agency.

Key technology trends being embraced by government are explored in this webinar including multi-channel citizen engagement, the Internet of Things (IoT), the increasing use of analytics and more.

Cloudera and Gartner explore some of the top technology trends in government and how they are having the greatest impact on improving outcomes for the public sector.
coveo:metadata.title: Exploring Big Data Trends with Gartner: Technologies Impacting the Public Sector

coveo:metadata.title: Introducing the Cloudera Data Science Workbench

coveo:metadata.description: In this webinar with Cloudera & Vivent, learn about: Big Data Maturity in the Enterprise, Trends Signaling a Shift, and a Maturity Story from the Front Line
coveo:metadata.title: Big Data Maturity Survey Webinar: Cloudera & Vivent

coveo:metadata.description:
"I've built a model -- now what?"

Developing a predictive model is only one part of a larger journey. Data scientists have to access and transform data, and engineer features, before exploratory modeling happens. A model doesn't do anything until it's applied to data, productionised and deployed.

3 Things to Learn About:

  • How to uplevel your existing analytics stack with a collaborative environment that supports the latest open source languages and libraries.
  • How to get better use of your core data management investments while opening up new supported tools for data science.
  • How to expand data science outside of silod environments and enable self-service data science access.
coveo:metadata.title: Part 3: Models in Production: A Look From Beginning to End

coveo:metadata.description: Learn how Cloudera Data Science Workbench helps you to accelerate analytics projects from data exploration to production, create a self-service data science platform, and deploy your models faster and share them with other data scientists.
coveo:metadata.title: Building Smarter Investing Strategies with Advanced Analytics and Machine Learning

coveo:metadata.description: Watch an interactive webinar to learn more about: Building scalable real time architectures for managing data from IoT, processing data in real time with components such as Kudu & Spark and customer case studies highlighting real-time IoT use cases.
coveo:metadata.title: Simplifying Real-Time Architectures for IoT with Apache Kudu

coveo:metadata.description: Learn about how to deploy community defined open data models to break vendor lock-in and gain complete enterprise visibility, how to open up application flexibility while building on a future proofed architecture, and how to infinitely scale data storage, access, and machine learning.
coveo:metadata.title: Supercharge Splunk with Cloudera

coveo:metadata.keywords: Videos,Webinars,Spark,Video,Cloudera Altus,Big Data,Hadoop,Cloudera Director,Data Science and Engineering,Cloud,Webinars
coveo:metadata.description: Cloudera Altus makes it easier for data engineers, ETL developers, and anyone who regularly works with raw data to process that data in the cloud efficiently and cost effectively. In this webinar we introduce our new platform-as-a-service offering and explore challenges associated with data processing in the cloud today, how Altus abstracts cluster overhead to deliver easy, efficient data processing, and unique features and benefits of Cloudera Altus.
coveo:metadata.title: Cloudera Altus: Big Data in the Cloud Made Easy

coveo:metadata.description: The Big Picture webinar series explores how industries define their strategies for understanding their consumers better using data. From issuing better healthcare to smarter product and services recommendations, data is the fueling foundation for success. Cloudera is a modern platform that gives analytic access to users that need to understand their customers across multiple touch points and multiple enterprise systems. Cloudera not only unlocks the promise of true customer 360 but it also leverages advanced capabilities for data science and machine learning. In this webinar, we take a look at how data scientists can leverage Cloudera to identify and predict a common customer loyalty use case in telecommunications. We will explore the data, design our features, and then leverage Apache Spark to help us make some predictions on the accuracy of our finding. All within a secure and collaborative environments utilizing the Cloudera Data Science Workbench.
coveo:metadata.title: The Big Picture: Learned Behaviors in Churn

coveo:metadata.description: With 2030 billion things connected by 2020, IoT has the potential to be one of the most disruptive technological advances in recent ages. However, without the right data management strategy, investments in IoT can yield limited results. So what are the key drivers and patterns for IoT adoption across industries? What are the Top 5 IoT use cases gaining the most traction today? What are the key considerations for data management for IoT? What happens at the edge and what happens in the cloud?
coveo:metadata.title: Making IoT Real - Maturity, Trends & Real World Use Cases

coveo:metadata.description: As more Cloudera customers explore the benefits of moving to the cloud, security, maximizing performance, and reducing cost are common concerns. This video discusses how to use Cloudera Director, Microsoft Active Directory, SAMBA, and SSSD to deploy a secure EDH cluster for workloads in the public Azure cloud. Followed by a deep dive into integration with Azure Data Lake Store vs. other storage alternatives.
coveo:metadata.title: Cloudera Enterprise Security on Microsoft Azure

coveo:metadata.description: IoT is reshaping the manufacturing and industrial processes, effectively changing the paradigm from one of repair and replace to more of predict and prevent. Using data streaming from connected equipment and machinery, organizations can now monitor the health of their assets and effectively predict when and how an asset might fail. However, without the right data management strategy and tools, investments in IoT can yield limited results. Join Cloudera and Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) for a joint webinar to learn more about how organizations are using advanced analytics and machine learning to drive IoT enabled predictive maintenance.
coveo:metadata.title: IoT-Enabled Predictive Maintenance

coveo:metadata.description: One of the primary reasons companies look to the public cloud is because they believe it can reduce their total cost of IT ownership (TCO). But the truth is cloud can often be more expensive than on-prem deployments, and if youre not careful, the services you run can lead to lock in and limit your flexibility. In this webinar, we provide guidance on total cost of ownership in the cloud. We also cover how and when to use cloud object storage, preemptible instances, and transient clusters. Lastly, we look at how increasingly popular multi-cloud strategies can help you lower costs and risk.
coveo:metadata.title: How to Lower TCO and Avoid Cloud Lock-in

coveo:metadata.description: In todays fast moving world, the ability to capture and process massive amounts of data and make valuable insights is key to gaining a competitive advantage. For RingCentral, a leader in Unified Communications, this is very true since they work with over 350,000 organizations worldwide. With such scale, it can be difficult to address quality issues when they appear while supporting additional calls.
coveo:metadata.title: Driving Better Products with Customer Intelligence

coveo:metadata.description: Join us for a webinar with Intel's Director of Security & Privacy for Health & Life Sciences, Niara's VP of Product Line Management, and Rocky DeStefano, Cloudera Security SME, as they describe the current threat landscape and security best practices for Health and Life Sciences organizations.
coveo:metadata.title: Protecting Health and Life Science Organizations from Breaches and Ransomware

coveo:metadata.description: Cybersecurity takes more than just technology; it takes a holistic strategy driven by the c-suite that includes managerial, organizational, and other strategic aspects of cybersecurity. In this HBR webinar, learn about cybersecurity strategies c-suite executives are implementing to better protect their organization.
coveo:metadata.title: Cybersecurity for the C-Suite

coveo:metadata.description: 3 Things to Learn About: *how to leverage its unique capabilities to extract more value from your data. *three options for running Cloudera in the cloud - IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS - highlighting key similarities and differences *how you can use cloud object storage to ensure business continuity.
coveo:metadata.title: Part 2: How to Run Your Cloud Right

coveo:metadata.description: Complying with industry regulations is a deep-seated function for financial institutions, but the ever-changing nature and nuanced complexities of these regulations can be a strain on resources. Todays institutions are turning to big data to dramatically reduce their response time to regulations and free up resources to focus on revenue drivers.
coveo:metadata.title: How Nordea Uses Data to Comply with Financial Regulations

coveo:metadata.keywords: Videos,Webinars,Video,Analytics,Cloudera Manager,Webinars,HBase,Cloudera Enterprise,Hadoop,Big Data,Kudu,Cloudera Enterprise,Cloudera Data Science Workbench,Machine Learning
coveo:metadata.description:
Deep learning expands boundaries of the possible. Detecting fraud. Predicting claims. Diagnosing cancer. Deep learning solves these problems and many others. However, organizations struggle to make deep learning work. Clouderawith tools like the Cloudera Data Science Workbenchhelps you bring deep learning to your data, for new insights and applications. A demonstration of Cloudera Data Science Workbench is included in the webinar.

3 things to learn: Practical ways to move forward with deep learning, deep learning without massive new investments, and how to implement self-service deep learning on demand.
coveo:metadata.title: Deep Learning with Cloudera

coveo:metadata.keywords: Customer Experience Management,Videos,Webinars,Video,Analytics,Customer Insights,Predictive Maintenance,Webinars,Industrial IoT,Internet of Things,Cloudera Enterprise,Smart Cities,Connected Vehicles,Cloudera Data Science Workbench,Machine Learning
coveo:metadata.description: With billions of new devices, IoT is transforming how businesses capitalize on data. Data driven organizations are using IoT as as a means to improve their customer experience, drive operational efficiencies, and enable new business models. However, without the right data management strategy and tools, investments in IoT can yield limited results. Join Cloudera and 451 Research for a joint webinar to learn more about some of the data management best practices and how organizations are using advanced analytics and machine learning to enable IoT use cases.
coveo:metadata.title: IoT - Data Management Trends, Best Practices, & Use Cases
coveo:metadata.useCase: Customer Experience Management|Predictive Maintenance|Industrial IoT|Smart Cities|Connected Vehicles

coveo:metadata.description: For the majority of organisations, the goal of GDPR compliance presents an enterprise-wide business problem a massive cross-departmental effort that impacts oversight, technology, processes and people. With a landscape full of siloed, disconnected systems, processes and applications, it is challenging enough to build a complete customer picture, let alone complying with the principles and security concepts the regulation now adds. Yet compliance not only reduces business risk by preventing large fines, it also increases reputation with customers and their level of trust.
coveo:metadata.title: Simplify your response to GDPR

coveo:metadata.description: New research shows that 57% of the buying cycle is completed before a prospect even speaks to a company. Marketers already know this, Ninety-six percent (96%) of organizations believe that email personalization can improve email marketing performance. But where do we get this increasingly personal direction? The answer is likely in your customer data. In order to understand your customer needs contextualized in the moment they feel the need to act you will require a platform that can leverage real-time data. Apache Kudu is a Cloudera component that makes dealing with quickly changing data fast and easy. Companies are leveraging next generation data stores like Kudu to build data applications that deliver smart promotions, real-time offers, and personalized marketing. Join us as we discuss modern approaches to real-time application development and highlight key Cloudera use cases being powered by Clouderas operational database.
coveo:metadata.title: The Big Picture: Real-time Data isDefining Intelligent Offers

coveo:metadata.description: Banks are rich in valuable data and can build and maintain a competitive advantage by identifying and executing on high-value machine learning projects leveraging the rich data available. This webinar will describe use cases fit for big data and machine learning in the banking sector (commercial, consumer, regulatory, and markets) and the impact they can have for your organization.
coveo:metadata.title: Transforming Banking with Big Data and Automated Machine Learning

coveo:metadata.description: Alternative data for capital markets, such as satellite imagery, logistics data, and social media feeds, has been getting a lot of attention recently. Like any trending topic, its uses and benefits can be hyped up a bit but if the right plumbing and creativity is in place, those benefits can be realized.
coveo:metadata.title: Put Alternative Data to Use in Capital Markets

coveo:metadata.description: From compliance, to credit analytics, to customer insights, to fraud detection and prevention, learn how one powerful platform can help your organization derive analytic insights, improve real-time decision making, and deliver a better customer experience.
coveo:metadata.title: Webinar | Modern Data Strategy for Regional and Mid-Size Banks

coveo:metadata.description: How good would your decisions be if you had all the facts, all the data? This goal is more and more a nirvana for organisations as the digital universe continues to grow in size. Data arrives at the speed of real time and from ever more sources both inside and outside the organisation. Fact-based decision-makinglet alone the evaluation of what-if scenarios, ideas, and approachesbecomes increasingly impossible. Or does it?
coveo:metadata.title: Webinar | Augmented intelligence for banking and other industries with Simudyne and Cloudera

coveo:metadata.description: For the majority of organizations, the goal of GDPR compliance presents an enterprise-wide business problem a massive cross-departmental effort that impacts oversight, technology, processes and people. With a landscape full of siloed, disconnected systems, processes and applications, it is challenging enough to build a complete customer picture, let alone complying with the principles and security concepts the regulation now adds. Yet compliance not only reduces business risk by preventing large fines, it also increases reputation with customers and their level of trust.
coveo:metadata.title: Simplify Your Response to GDPR Webinar

coveo:metadata.description:
Machine learning and analytics applications are exploding in the enterprise; driving use cases for preventative maintenance, delivering new desirable product offers to customers at the right time, and combating insider threats to your business.
But each of these high-value use cases rely on a variety of data analysis capabilities working in concert to combine data from different sources into a single coherent picture. Cloudera SDX delivers a shared data experience that makes applications easier to develop, less expensive to deploy and more consistently secure.
coveo:metadata.title: How to Build Multi-disciplinary Analytics Applications on a Shared Data Platform

coveo:metadata.description: Enterprise data warehouses (EDW) have long been the norm to handle analytic processing, but these systems have been pushed to their limits trying to support more data and increasing usage. These constraints on data flexibility, self-service access, and cost-effective scalability have forced IT teams into a pattern of saying no to new business demands as they focus on containing the costs of existing workloads.
coveo:metadata.title: Break Free of the Analytic Constraints: Seamlessly migrate workloads with Cloudera and MicroStrategy

coveo:metadata.product: Data Science and Engineering|Cloudera Enterprise|Cloudera Data Science Workbench
coveo:metadata.keywords: Videos,Webinars,Video,Healthcare,Analytics,Data Science and Engineering,Healthcare Analytics,Webinars,Healthcare & Life Sciences,Cloudera Enterprise,Big Data,Cloudera Data Science Workbench,Data Science
coveo:metadata.description:
The global healthcare Natural Language Processing (NLP) market is expected to grow from $1.10 billion in 2015 to $2.67 billion by 2020, according to a report from Markets and Markets. This growth is driven by the need to better understand and manage the health and wellness of patient populations in a changing healthcare landscape. But with 80% of healthcare data in unstructured Big Data, so much insight is trapped in text. How are payers and providers to extract these insights and apply them in statistical and machine learning models?
This Cloudera webinar with Linguamatics explores NLP techniques for data discovery and information extraction to enhance predictive risk models, improve population stratification and automate capture of quality measures.
coveo:metadata.title: Use cases for NLP in Healthcare with Linguamatics

coveo:metadata.description: IoT is here to stay. As more data is processed, analyzed, and managed, IDG Research found that this data is processed in a central information hub, combined with other data, rather than processing it at the edge. Learn how to get the most out of IoT data and how to manage it.
coveo:metadata.title: IDG Webinar: IoT Strategy - Balancing Data between the Edge and Hub
coveo:metadata.useCase: Healthcare Analytics|Predictive Maintenance|Industrial IoT|Smart Cities|Connected Vehicles

coveo:metadata.description: Given the speed of change, rapid innovation, and the wide variety of standards and use cases that the Internet of Things (IoT) enables, organizations are increasingly looking at open source architectures for IoT in order to drive innovation and accelerate development. Join Cloudera and Red Hat for a joint webinar to learn more about an end-to-end architecture for IoT based on open source and open standards. In this session we'll showcase an end-to-end architecture for IoT highlighting Eclipse Kura, which is an open source stack for gateways and the edge, and Eclipse Kapua, an open source IoT cloud platform.
coveo:metadata.title: An Open Source Architecture for IoT

coveo:metadata.keywords: Customer Experience Management,Videos,Webinars,Video,Big Data,Customer Insights,Webinars,Machine Learning,Personalized & Relevancy Marketing
coveo:metadata.description: Customer experience is a catalyst in many digital transformation projects. It is why many businesses invest in new technologies and processes to more effectively engage customers, constituents, or employees. The goal of putting digital tools to work in a transformative way is to ensure that data and insights connect people with information and processes that ultimately lead to a better experience for customers. Yet, it demands a modern approach that considers all of the platforms, processes, and data across the customer journey. The goal for many organizations is dynamically maintaining a single source of truth about each customer to drive personalized experiences based on individual preferences and behaviors. However, businesses today have primarily invested in systems of record. While these systems are critical for managing internal operational processes, they are typically not effective for today's pace of business change. Insight-driven experiences require customer intelligence platforms that can finally create a customer 360. The deeper data and improved algorithms now available let users factor in individual affinity, segment, and a myriad of growing data sources. The result is greater relevance and effectiveness to deliver a differentiated experience that in todays competitive landscape is not a luxury, but a necessity for survival.
coveo:metadata.title: Customer Experience: A Catalyst for Digital Transformation

coveo:metadata.keywords: Videos,Webinars,Video,Cloudera Enterprise,Cloudera Altus,Cloud,Cloudera Enterprise,Webinars,Healthcare & Life Sciences
coveo:metadata.description: Join Clouderas Alex Moundalexis, who will discuss time-saving design and best practices for deploying Cloudera Enterprise clusters in AWS. He will also be joined by Josh Hammer, Partner Solutions Architect at Amazon Web Services who will highlight unique advantages of running Cloudera on AWS. In this interactive webinar, we will hear from Celgene, a global biopharmaceutical company and we will explore best practices of running your Cloudera Enterprise cluster on AWS.
coveo:metadata.title: Customer Best Practices: Optimizing Cloudera on AWS

coveo:metadata.product: Data Science and Engineering|Cloudera Enterprise|Cloudera Data Science Workbench

coveo:metadata.description: Savvy Leaders of Business Transformation and Competitive Advantage strategies are leveraging Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) to deliver valuable insights and operational intelligence that help them prepare to be digital, understand their customers, and, drive revenue growth in real-time. While business leaders agree that AI and ML can boost their bottom line and deliver an enhanced customer experience, theyre challenged on how to start-and quickly benefit and show ROI from-an AI and ML-based digital transformation.
coveo:metadata.title: Using AI and ML to Engage Customers and Drive Growth
coveo:metadata.useCase: Customer Experience Management|Modernize Architecture|Personalized & Relevancy Marketing

coveo:metadata.description: Join industry superstars Mike Olson (Cloudera CSO and co-founder) and Jim Curtis (451 Research senior analyst) as they outline the best practices for cloud-based machine learning and analytics in this cant miss webinar.
coveo:metadata.title: Optimize your cloud strategy for machine learning and analytics

coveo:metadata.description: Machine learning and artificial intelligence are changing the world. From diagnosing heart disease, detecting fraud, predicting insurance claims, to revolutionizing agriculture. Cloudera Fast Forward Labs helps executives to define an investment strategy in these areas to better their businesses. Researchers introduce innovations in machine learning daily. Technical jargon is opaque. Vendor hype muddies the waters. Industry analysts cover the field, but only at a high level. Let Cloudera Fast Forward Labs accelerate your machine learning journey. Delivering a unique blend of applied research and hands-on explanations that you can apply to your business today.
coveo:metadata.title: Cloudera Fast Forward Labs: Accelerate machine learning

coveo:metadata.description: SAP has been a leader in ERP software for years yet it can be difficult to access, merge, and combine SAP data with other data sources. Datavard with their Datavard Glue solution simplifies the flow of data between SAP and Cloudera Enterprise which allows for easier access to ERP data that can be used in self-service analytics of customer, manufacturing, and IoT data.
coveo:metadata.title: Driving increased value out of SAP with Datavard & Cloudera
coveo:metadata.useCase: Customer Experience Management|Predictive Maintenance|Industrial IoT|Modernize Architecture

coveo:metadata.description: Just how effective are recommendation systems in understanding the things they are recommending? Cloudera Fast Forward Labs researched recommendation systems, particularly focusing on how machines can better understand the content of the things they recommend. This video also previews our semantic recommender software prototype that you can play with.
coveo:metadata.title: Cloudera Fast Forward Labs: Building a Better Recommendation System

coveo:metadata.description:
Cloudera empowers cybersecurity innovators to proactively secure the enterprise by accelerating threat detection, investigation, and response through machine learning and complete enterprise visibility. Clouderas cybersecurity solution, based on Apache Spot, enables anomaly detection, behavior analytics, and comprehensive access across all enterprise data using an open, scalable platform. But whats the easiest way to get started?

Join Cloudera, StreamSets, and Arcadia Data as we show you first hand how we have made it easier to get your first use case up and running. During this session you will learn:
  • Signs you need Clouderas cybersecurity solution
  • How StreamSets can help increase enterprise visibility
  • Providing your security analyst the right context at the right time with modern visualizations
coveo:metadata.title: Get Started with Clouderas Cyber Solution

coveo:metadata.product: Cloudera Altus|Cloudera Enterprise|Operational DB|Data Science and Engineering|Data Warehouse
coveo:metadata.keywords: Videos,Webinars,Video,Cloudera Altus,Cloudera Enterprise,Operational DB,Analytics,Data Science and Engineering,Cloud,Data Warehouse,Modernize Architecture,Webinars
coveo:metadata.description:
Over the past decade, big data implementations have been more sophisticated in particular for organizations operationalizing machine learning, analytics and data engineering. The pressures of data-driven cultures, multiple workload applications such as customer care, fraud management and cross-platform marketing are changing the game. Mixing machine learning with business processes and operationalizing analytics with data engineering practices places burdens on IT teams. Making these advanced data environments all work together is an ongoing challenge.
While you can still swipe and go to implement data management environments in the cloud for an easy solution, the easy path is often littered with additional costs, higher overhead in terms of maintenance and synchronization. Data savvy organizations are taking a more measured and coordinated approach to their machine learning, analytics and data engineering infrastructures. These proactive approaches speed adoption among business stakeholders and lower administration and governance issues for technologists.
Join John L Myers, managing research director at leading IT analyst firm Enterprise Management Associates (EMA), and Nik Rouda, director of product marketing at Cloudera, to discover how the world of cloud implementations have changed for the better and the future of an enterprise grade cloud environment for your organization using the right resources.
Attend this webinar to learn about: Drivers for implementing machine learning, analytics and data engineering with a proactive approach Pitfalls associated with immediate gratification implementations How business stakeholders benefit from proactive approaches How proactive implementations improve the workloads of technologists Examples of real world customer implementations
coveo:metadata.title: Strategies for Enterprise-grade Azure-based Analytics

coveo:metadata.description: Expectations are changing for and within enterprises. In order to innovate and differentiate, they expect and require ever shorter times to insight into their business. They also require insights that are predictive and prescriptive in nature rather than descriptive. Customers expectations are changing too. They expect businesses to know them, to know them as individuals, and to provide tailored experiences. Exploding data volumes and the surge of real-time, unstructured sources mean traditional Business Intelligence (BI) and analytics efforts are unable to cope and deliver. However, plenty of data combined with low cost compute power provide the ideal circumstances for machine learning and artificial intelligence to flourish and meet the changing expectations. More data leads to better models; better models that in turn lead to better business decisions. Data science as a discipline will deliver on this promise yet why do so many organisations struggle to capitalise on the opportunity? Covering data science from both the business as well as technical perspective, this event will provide you with the complete insight you need to either start or enhance your data science projects.
coveo:metadata.title: Machine Learning & Data Science Essentials

Bringing together all your data for analytics and machine learning unlocks new insights and business value. Traditional architectural approaches will need to be adjusted to be compliant with several of the provisions. The good news is that Cloudera can help you!

Nutzer wnschen sich daher, diese komplexen Workflows zu vereinheitlichen und zu vereinfachen. coveo:metadata.description:

Jeder dieser hochwertigen Anwendungsflle beruht jedoch auf einer Vielzahl von Datenanalysefunktionen, die zusammenarbeiten mssen, um Daten aus verschiedenen Quellen zu einem einzigen kohrenten Bild zu kombinieren. coveo:metadata.description:
More than any business, telecommunications firms have long been dealing with huge, diverse sets of data. Big Data. Data that is unstructured, unwieldy and disorganised, making it difficult to analyse and costly to manage. Your landscape is fiercely competitive and you instinctively know it's exactly that data that would allow you to be more innovative. Data that would set you apart from the competition. You would like to realise its true potential yet you have concerns around security, RoI or integration with existing data management solutions.
These are the Big Data myths that hold you back.
Thankfully there are those that have gone before you and demonstrate the myths are nothing but fiction. Fraud is significantly reduced, enhanced customer experience drives higher customer lifetime value and RoI between 200 and 250% can be achieved.

coveo:metadata.keywords: Videos,Webinars,Data Science and Engineering,Modernize Architecture,Webinars,Cloudera Data Science Workbench,Machine Learning,Fast Forward Labs Research
coveo:metadata.description: Machine learning and artificial intelligence are exciting technologies, but success means excitement about business outcomes, not technology. Could success make AI boring? In this session we will cover: 1) Scaling enterprise ML across people, process, strategy, and technology; 2) building and deploying automated, repeatable, and predictable ML models; and 3) a vision for an enterprise AI platform that turns data into predictions, at any scale, anywhere.
coveo:metadata.title: Industrialize AI with Enterprise Scale Machine Learning

coveo:metadata.keywords: Videos,Enterprise Data Hub (EDH),Webinars,Cloudera Enterprise,Big Data,Analytics,Data Warehouse,Webinars
coveo:metadata.description: The modern era of data warehousing has a high emphasis on self-service and global access to data, which raises the questions: How can we optimize workloads originated from self-service applications? How can we maintain data warehouse health as it is leveraged by more diverse analytics? How can we ensure scalability without having to increase IT resources? To enable self service and modernize with confidence, modern tools will be needed to increase visibility into workloads, automate health checks and workload tuning, and introduce self-service troubleshooting to the user community. Follow Bloor Group CEO Eric Kavanagh and Chief Scientist Geoffrey Malafsky in this on-demand webinar discussing the new age of data warehousing.
coveo:metadata.title: Bloor Group: Modernizing the Legacy Data Warehouse With Confidence

coveo:metadata.product: Data Science and Engineering|Cloudera Data Science Workbench|Fast Forward Labs Research
coveo:metadata.keywords: Videos,Webinars,Data Science and Engineering,Modernize Architecture,Webinars,Cloudera Data Science Workbench,Machine Learning,Fast Forward Labs Research
coveo:metadata.description: Machine learning and artificial intelligence are exciting technologies, but success means excitement about business outcomes, not technology. Could success make AI boring? In this session we will cover. Scaling enterprise ML across people, process, strategy, and technology. Building and deploying automated, repeatable, and predictable ML models. A vision for an enterprise AI platform that turns data into predictions, at any scale, anywhere.
coveo:metadata.title: Industrialize AI with Enterprise Scale Machine Learning

coveo:metadata.description: Join Cloudera Fast Forward Labs Research Engineer, Mike Lee Williams, to hear about their latest research report and prototype on Federated Learning. Learn more about what it is, when its applicable, how it works, and the current landscape of tools and libraries.
coveo:metadata.title: Federated Learning: ML with Privacy on the Edge

coveo:metadata.product: Cloudera Enterprise|Operational DB|Data Science and Engineering|Workload XM|Cloudera Data Science Workbench

coveo:metadata.description: Discover the origins of big data, discuss existing and new projects, share common use cases for those projects, and explain how you can modernize your architecture using data analytics, data operations, data engineering and data science. Big Data Fundamentals is your prerequisite to building a modern platform for machine learning and analytics optimized for the cloud. We'll close out with a live Q&A with some of our technical experts as well.
coveo:metadata.title: Big Data Fundamentals - Part 2

coveo:metadata.keywords: Customer Experience Management,Videos,Webinars,Bardess Group, Ltd.,Video,Cloudera Enterprise,Big Data,Qlik,Webinars,Personalized & Relevancy Marketing
coveo:metadata.description: Cloudera SDX is by no means no restricted to just the platform; it extends well beyond. In this webinar, we show you how Bardess Groups Zero2Hero solution leverages the shared data experience to coordinate Cloudera, Trifacta, and Qlik to deliver complete customer insight.
coveo:metadata.title: Extending Cloudera SDX beyond the Platform

coveo:metadata.keywords: Data warehouse replacement,Videos,Webinars,Video,Big Data,Data Warehouse,Data warehousing offload,Webinars,Workload XM
coveo:metadata.description: Explore new trends and use cases in data warehousing including exploration and discovery, self-service ad-hoc analysis, predictive analytics and more ways to get deeper business insight. Modern Data Warehousing Fundamentals will show how to modernize your data warehouse architecture and infrastructure for benefits to both traditional analytics practitioners and data scientists and engineers.
coveo:metadata.title: Modern Data Warehousing Fundamentals

coveo:metadata.description: Learn how organizations are deriving unique customer insights, improving product and services efficiency, and reducing business risk with a modern big data architecture powered by Cloudera on AWS. In this webinar, you see how fast and easy it is to deploy a modern data management platformin your cloud, on your terms.
coveo:metadata.title: Leveraging the Cloud for Big Data Analytics

coveo:metadata.product: Cloudera Enterprise|Operational DB|Data Science and Engineering|Workload XM|Cloudera Data Science Workbench
